title: The Time-Bound Saint Believes in the Devil - Novel Updates

author: 서은
description:
Realia endured living with her horrible family for 18 long years.
It's been long enough, and it was time to become happy. She hoped to make money and marry into a good life! But life disagreed. 

“I am a Saint? The Saints who can live only up to two years?”

She couldn’t believe it, She thought she only had the best of life left to enjoy. 'I am time bound?' To add, a devil that only she could see continues to lurk around her.

“Then, will you make a contract with me?”

'Who would make a contract with a devil? I will be the only one to decide the choices of my life!'

***

She searches for a path which doesn't include death or contracts. But the world was not such an easy place.

'I thought it would be fine as long as I can live well, as long as I could be happy. That is what I thought before I became a Saint, however it wasn't like that.'

'I cannot understand why there are so many people who need my help. I cannot ignore them.'

The story of a Saint with a limited life span of two years, trying to change the world. 

'I cannot return to my ignorant self any longer.'

Will Raelia be able to change the world? 


>
